entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is the company offering the Global Restricted Stock Unit Agreement under its Amended & Restated 2007 Equity Incentive Plan.

entities.name: MELLANOX TECHNOLOGIES, LTD.
entities.description: Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. is a company mentioned in the context of change in control agreements, which are not applicable to the current Award.

entities.name: PARTICIPANT
entities.description: The individual who acknowledges and agrees to the terms and conditions of the Agreement and the Plan.

relationships.relationship_description: Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. is mentioned in the context of change in control agreements, which are not applicable to the current Award by NVIDIA Corporation.
The Participant agrees to the terms and conditions set forth by NVIDIA Corporation in the Agreement and the Plan.
